Save plot in multiple formats using cowplot::save_plot

Source: R/save_plot.R
save_plot.Rd

Wrapper around cowplot::save_plot to save plots in multiple formats.

Usage

save_plot(filename, plot, device = c("png", "pdf"), ...)

Arguments

filename

character. Name of plot (including directory, if not to save in working directory).

plot

gg object. Output from either ggplot2::ggplot or cowplot::plot_grid.

device

character vector. Devices to save in (i.e. plot format). Default is c("png", "pdf").

...

passed on to cowplot::save_plot.

Value

invisible(filename).

On this page
